author: akarasulu
msg: o cleaning up dependencies since they are now transitive with m2
o centralizing things like junit deps so they are not everywhere
o made slf4j dep use 'provided' scope since the target implementation
to use will be chosen by the application using API's like MINA.  This
seems to work really well.  For example I've made the mina-examples
use the nlog4j implementation jar (with provided scope) and this allows
me to filter out some of the output noise generated by examples without
effecting the rest of mina or those apps that will use mina.
o filtered noise in build coming from mina-examples using log4j.properties
o started cleaning up other projects as well now that slf4j is set as a

author: jvanzyl
msg: adding stub wiki mangement sandbox project for stephane

author: brett
msg: don't recommend using extensions, they are resolved too early and put into the main classloader which is bound to cause pain.
if it doesn't work as a plugin dependency, we should fix that.
